mashFermentables.usedIn: Wheat beers and adjunct for ales up to 40%of grist.

yeasts.description: This famous yeast strain from Weihenstephan in Germany is used world-wide within the brewing industry. SafLager W-34/70 allows to brew beers with a good balance of floral and fruity aromas and gives clean flavors and high drinkable beers.
yeasts.name: SafLager Lager

fermentables.name: Wheat Malt
fermentables.usedIn: Wheat beers and adjunct for ales up to 40%of grist.

recipe.author: The Thirsty Otter
recipe.name: Bock Dich, Befehl Ich Dir v3

hops.notes: A delicate aroma hop used mainly over the years in Lager type beers. However, it has also been successful in the production of some of the lighter English cask conditioned ales. A floral, slightly fruity flavour.
hops.name: Hallertau Hersbrucker

recipe.notes:
Yeast alternatives:
Wyeast Labs:  2206 Bavarian Lager
White Labs: WLP830 German Lager
Wyeast Labs:  2308 Munich Lager

Dry Yeast:
Fermentis: Saflager W-34/70
